label: A2BC_oP8_51_i_a_f-001
title: $\alpha$-UB$_{2}$C Structure
comments:
This is the ground state of UB$_{2}$C, stable up to 1675$^\circ$C.  Above that temperature it transforms to rhombohedral $\beta$-UB$_{2}$C with the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC_hR12_166_g_d_ac-001}{ThB$_{2}$C structure}. (Rogl, 1991) 
 We use the data taken at 29K. 
 The origin has been shifted to put the carbon atoms on the (2a) site.
